get.description: Retrieve the public API key associated with the specific merchant & developer app. The merchant UUID (mId) & app UUID is pulled from the authtoken used. If AutoActivateOnGet is true, an API key is generated (if one does not exist).

200.description: A successful response that returns the requested API key

active.description: Set to true if the API key is active

apiKey.description: API key associated with the merchant & developer app

createdTime.description: Timestamp of when the API key was created

modifiedTime.description: Timestamp of when the API key was last updated
